snippet.title: Tampopo RPG by Calman (Development Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
I am working on Tampopo - a heartfelt Earthbound-like JRPG adventure with unique physics based combat. I want to bring it to every platform I can whenever it is done. This project means everything to me, it represents who I am as an artist and I can’t wait to have you play it.

If you want to get updates please follow:
instagram.com/tampopo_rpg/
twitter.com/tampoporpg
